devops:mdsource:compare:build.description: Compare two metadata format source directories and build a third with the changes
examples:
$ sfdx hello:org --targetusername myOrg@example.com --targetdevhubusername devhub@org.com
  Hello world! This is org: MyOrg and I will be around until Tue Mar 20 2018!
  My hub org id is: 00Dxx000000001234

$ sfdx hello:org --name myname --targetusername myOrg@example.com
  Hello myname! This is org: MyOrg and I will be around until Tue Mar 20 2018!

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

destructivechanges.name: destructivechanges
destructivechanges.description: If destructive changes should be included and if so which mode
